name: getParameterAtLocation

type.rawType: <T = any>(object: { [key: string]: any; }, location: string[]) => T

value:
<T = any>(
  object: { [key: string]: any },
  location: string[]
): T => {
  const firstParameter = object[location[0]];

  if (location.length === 1) return firstParameter;

  return getParameterAtLocation(firstParameter, location.slice(1));
}
description: utility function to get a parameter inside of a nested object
